home.heroSubtitle: If your training feels chaotic, inconsistent, or stuck—I'll help you build a simple structure that fits your life and moves you forward.
home.heroCred: Runners • Cyclists • Triathletes • Calm, science-informed process • Limited roster for high attention
optimizeItems: A weekly structure you can repeat without burning out

home.aboutBody: I'm Milan, a UESCA Certified Triathlon Coach. I coach runners, cyclists, and triathletes with a simple goal: turn your effort into consistent progress. We use data (pace, power, HR, lactate when available) but decisions are guided by context and RPE—so the plan stays realistic, not theoretical.
aboutBullets: Style: individualization, progressive overload, recovery respect

home.developingBody: I keep my roster small on purpose—so you get high attention, thoughtful planning, and fast adjustments when life happens. I stay current through ongoing education (including metabolic profiling workshops) and I coach with a calm, athlete-first approach. No hype—just a process you can trust.

processSteps.title: Intro call (30-60 min)

processSteps.title: Setup week
processSteps.body: We align schedule, set training zones/testing if needed, and start with a clear first structure.

processSteps.title: Train and iterate
processSteps.body: Weekly feedback, smart progression, and adjustments based on how you respond.
